code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='http://127.0.0.1:8000/api';export const convertCode=async(code,sourceLanguage,targetLanguage)=>{const response=await axios.post(`${API_URL}/convert`,{code,source_language:sourceLanguage,target_language:targetLanguage});return response.data;};export const debugCode=async code=>{const response=await axios.post(`${API_URL}/debug`,{code});return response.data;};export const checkCodeQuality=async code=>{const response=await axios.post(`${API_URL}/quality`,{code});return response.data;};
